DOC.brief_summary: MOVE UP weight management program adult 60-75 community setting lead trained community health worker .
DOC.detailed_description: MOVE UP weight management program design adult desire lose weight improve overall health . Topics include : Overall Health , Weight management , Healthy eating , Behavior change , Physical activity
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 6075 time program start 2 . Selfreporting < 60 minute per week moderate structure physical activity 3 . BMI > = 30 < 40 screen . In person measurement site allow 2745 inclusion criterion . 4 . Able consent participation data collection 5 . Medical release start Weight Management 6 . Ability walk without assistive device 7 . Can regularly attend session 8 . Has bariatric surgery past year , current use weight loss prescription drug . 1 . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( FBS > 300 & A1C > 11 % ) [ assess physician medical release ] 2 . Uncontrolled hypertension ( SBP > 180/110 ) % ) [ assess physician medical release ] 3 . Recent hospitalization ( past 6 month ) 4 . Active treatment cancer ( nonmelanoma skin cancer ) 5 . Significant visual hearing impairment 6 . Dementia/psychiatric disorder 7 . Inability communicate English/lack translator
